channel.title: 3920 - Colloquium on Teaching and Professional Practices on GIS @ Harvard Libraries
channel.description: Recent content in 3920 - Colloquium on Teaching and Professional Practices on GIS @ Harvard Libraries

item.title: Spring 2023 Harvard Map Collection
item.description: OldNYC: Mapping Historic Photographs at the NYPL. 1880 census from Archive.org . ArcGIS Map comparing 1890 atlas to today. Belle’s house in college. City of Boston Archives Reading Room. 19th century insurance atlas, open to a plate of downtown Boston. Analyze Boston , Boston’s open data portal. Vision Zero dataset, open as a table. Bike crash data displayed visually as individual points in GIS software. Introduction to GIS workshop in the library calendar.
